message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet high standards. I believe its unique features and benefits make it an exceptional value. I am offering it to you for $200, reflecting its quality and the benefits it provides. I look forward to your consideration.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $200 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I would like to make a special offer for you. If you agree to purchase the product within the next 24 hours, I can lower the price to $180. This is still a premium price considering the quality and value of the product, but I believe it's a fair compromise given your current budget. Please let me know if this works for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer but $180 is still a bit high for me.  I'm happy to go with your initial offer of $150, or I can unfortunately move on to another vendor.
